Package index

Mosaics

Extensions of vcd::mosaic() and related displays to glm and gnm objects and 3D displays

mosaic(<glm>) sieve(<glm>) assoc(<glm>)
Mosaic plots for fitted generalized linear and generalized nonlinear models
mosaic(<glmlist>) mosaic(<loglmlist>)
Mosaic Displays for glmlist and loglmlist Objects
glmlist() loglmlist() coef(<glmlist>)
Create a Model List Object
mosaic3d()
3D Mosaic Plots
split3d() range3d() center3d()
Subdivide a 3D Object
seq_mosaic()
Sequential Mosaics and Strucplots for an N-way Table
labeling_points()
Labeling Function for Mosaic Displays Using Points

Loglinear models

Functions for constructing and manipulating loglinear models

joint() conditional() mutual() saturated() markov() loglin2formula() loglin2string()
Loglinear Model Utilities
Crossings()
Crossings Interaction of Factors
Kway()
Fit All K-way Models in a GLM
glmlist() loglmlist() coef(<glmlist>)
Create a Model List Object
seq_loglm()
Sequential Loglinear Models for an N-way Table

Other graphical methods

Other functions for visualizing contingency tables

color_table()
Display Frequency Table with Colored Cell Backgrounds
mcaplot()
Simple and enhanced plot of MCA solutions

Statistical tests

Statistical tests for categorical data

CMHtest() print(<CMHtest>)
Generalized Cochran-Mantel-Haenszel Tests
GKgamma() print(<GKgamma>)
Calculate Goodman-Kruskal Gamma for ordered tables
print(<Kappa>)
Print Kappa
HLtest() print(<HLtest>) summary(<HLtest>) rootogram(<HLtest>) plot(<HLtest>)
Hosmer-Lemeshow Goodness of Fit Test
logLik(<loglm>)
Log-Likelihood of a loglm Object
LRstats()
Brief Summary of Model Fit for glm and loglm Models
modFit()
Brief Summary of Model Fit for a glm or loglm Object
woolf_test() print(<woolf_test>)
Woolf Test for Homogeneity of Odds Ratios
zero.test()
Score test for zero inflation in Poisson data

Distributions

Logseries distributions

dlogseries() plogseries() qlogseries() rlogseries()
The Logarithmic Series Distribution

Utility

Utility functions in the package

datasets()
Information on Data Sets in Packages
blogits()
Bivariate Logits and Log Odds Ratio
collapse.table()
Collapse Levels of a Table
cutfac()
Cut a Numeric Variable to a Factor
expand.dft()
Expand a frequency table to case form

Other

Other functions in the package (not yet classified)

Summarise()
Brief Summary of Model Fit for glm and loglm Models
update(<xtabs>)
Update method for a xtabs object
vcdExtra-package vcdExtra _PACKAGE
Extensions and additions to vcd: Visualizing Categorical Data
